answerText: meiosis[10] During meiosis of a primary oocyte, the cytokinesis steps are uneven. This is the name of the smaller cells created during that process, which often shrivel and die.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 8 | 13 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: During prophase I of this process, an exchange of genetic material called crossing over occurs. [10] Name this form of cell division which transforms diploid cells into haploid cells. This form of cell division only occurs in gametes.
